response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its significance and quality. I am offering it to you at a special price considering your appreciation for its worth. My proposal is to sell it to you for $950,000. This is a generous offer that allows you to secure a high-quality asset at a price that is below its market value. I believe this is a win-win situation for both of us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
